ui-developer.title: UI Developer
ui-developer.describtion: Convert figma designs into web pages, and make sure that everything is responsive.

javascript-frontend-developer.title: JavaScript Frontend Developer
javascript-frontend-developer.describtion: Fix frontend related bugs and add new features to the website.

react-js-developer.title: React.js Developer
react-js-developer.describtion: Fix frontend related bugs and add new features to the website.

data-analyst.title: Data Analyst
data-analyst.describtion: You will be given a small dataset and a set of questions to answer using that data. You will be expected to use your data analysis skills to answer the questions and present your findings in a clear and concise manner.

ui-ux-designer.title: UI/UX Designer
ui-ux-designer.describtion: Turn ideas into UI/UX designs, and redesign existing websites.

mobile-developer.title: Mobile Developer
mobile-developer.describtion: Convert UI/UX figma designs into fully functional mobile applications.

console-programmer.title: Console Programmer
console-programmer.describtion: Build console applications with your favorite programming language to solve certain problems.

web-scraping-specialist.title: Web Scraping Specialist
web-scraping-specialist.describtion: Write programs that can harvest/extract data from certain websites.

graphic-designer.title: Graphic Designer
graphic-designer.describtion: Design logos, banners, and social media posts.

backend-developer.title: Backend Developer
backend-developer.describtion: Build backend services, connect to databases, and integrate with APIs.

ai-engineer.title: AI Engineer
ai-engineer.describtion: Use certain general algorithms to build some simple artificial intelligence solutions.

image-processing-engineer.title: Image Processing Engineer
image-processing-engineer.describtion: Use your favourite programming language to write programs that manipulate images.

ml-engineer.title: ML Engineer
ml-engineer.describtion: You will be given a dataset and asked to build a machine learning model that can predict some missing properties, or classify something depending on the data included in the given dataset.

cv-engineer.title: CV Engineer
cv-engineer.describtion: You will be using what you have leant about computer vision to solve real-world problems such as detecting objects, manipulating them, and classifying them.
